OrgName: Credigy Solutions Inc. (and its U.S. affiliates wholly owned by Credigy Ltd.)
activities: Credigy is involved in the consumer and commercial debt purchase industry and Credigy would use personal information received from the EEA in furtherance of the above-referenced business activities, including the collection by external servicers of debts purchased through its subsidiaries.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: client, customer, business contacts, including manually processed and online data
